data.title: Valerie and Her Week of Wonders
data.meta_description: Quickly find out which films MUBI is showing in 90+ different countries around the world!
data.text:
Synopsis

Young Valerie lives with her grandmother. She feels the first stirring of sexual awareness when a carnival parade comes to town and a man presents her with a pair of magic earrings. When her fantasy adventures begin, the line between dreams and reality starts blurring.

MUBI's take

Inspired by fairy tales such as Alice in Wonderland, this surreal movie from Czech director Jaromil Jire≈° is a subtle, evocative exploration of the grotesque. Banned by the pro-Soviet regime of the time, Valerie and Her Week of Wonders daringly breaks the many rules of conventional narrative.
